title: Horizon Forbidden West was Delayed to Avoid Crunch - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.18.22
description:
GameSpot's Jordan Ramée joins Greg for a rockbolck of Horizon Forbidden West news, Dragon Age 4 rumors, and more! Follow Jordan at: https://twitter.com/JMRamee

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:30 - Housekeeping
I’m streaming Horizon Forbidden West after this – it’s all post-campaign content as I work on the Plat.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Gordon McGuire, James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), Pranksy, Manny The Bagel boy Sanchez, & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:09:20 - Horizon was delayed to avoid crunch, Hope Bellingham @ GamesRadar
00:11:43 - Do you think this will force the studio to change track now? - Best Friends Q:Takibi
00:16:55 - Horizon had to make the load screens longer to read the tips, N. Ingraham @ Engadget
00:22:45 -  PlayStation Studios Congratulating Guerrilla
00:26:05 -  Ad
00:28:35 - Dragon Age 4 in the next 18 months, Tom Phillips @ Eurogamer
00:35:40 - Retro Studios Changed its Twitter Banner, Eddie @ GameSpot
00:40:00 - TLOU HBO Not this Year, Lesley Goldberg @ THR
00:43:11 - Majora’s Mask Release Date
00:46:40 - Out today
00:47:40 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:
MON: Tim, Kahlief
TUES: SBM and Gary Whitta
WED: Blessing and Andy
THURS: Tim, Lucy
FRI: Blessing, Parris
